articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Manchester City host Real Madrid and Arsenal face Bayern Munich in the Champions League quarter-finals.
articles.title: Champions League: Build-up as Man City host Real Madrid & Arsenal face Bayern

articles.title: WSL: James not in Chelsea squad for Aston Villa visit
How City of Light changed the Olympics

articles.description: Toronto Raptors forward Jontay Porter is given a lifetime ban by the NBA for breaching the league's betting rules.
articles.title: Jontay Porter: Toronto Raptors forward given lifetime NBA ban for breaching betting rules

articles.description: Rafael Nadal's latest injury comeback - in what could be his final season before retirement - ends with a second-round defeat at the Barcelona Open.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal's comeback at Barcelona Open ended by Alex de Minaur

articles.description: The USA announce a star-studded basketball squad for Paris 2024 - with LeBron James, Kevin Durant and Stephen Curry included.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Stephen Curry, Kevin Durant and Lebron James in USA team

articles.description: Delhi Capitals recorded a six-wicket victory over Gujarat Titans inside nine overs in the Indian Premier League.
articles.title: Delhi race to quick-fire victory over Gujarat

articles.description: A win for Nelly Korda at this week's Chevron Championship would be a significant boost for the women's game, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Chevron Championship: Nelly Korda chasing fifth LPGA Tour win in row at first women's major of 2024

articles.description: The majority of elite female athletes in a new study support the categorisation of women's sport by biological sex, rather than gender identity.
articles.title: 'Fairness must take priority' in trans debate - new study

articles.description: England hooker Amy Cokayne will miss the Women's Six Nations match with Ireland at Twickenham after being sent off in the 46-0 win over Scotland.
articles.title: Cokayne banned for England's game with Ireland
